item.description:
Historic Churches of Boston Tour

The Historic Churches Tour will be split in two parts, a morning tour of the Churches will begin with Boston's most famous church the Old North Church. We will then head to St Leonards and St Stephens Church just a short walk away. Then it is on to Kings Chapel and the Cathedral Church of St Paul.

We will break for Lunch In Downtown Boston.

The Afternoon section will cover the Churches in and around the Copley District Starting with the Emmanuel Church located on Newbury St. We will then head over to the Church of the Covenant and the First and Second Church. Then it is on to the Old South Church and the Trinity Church. We will end the tour at the Catherdral of the Holy Cross.

Below are links to the Different Churches we will be photographing :

http://www.stpaulbost...

http://www.geocities....

item.name: Historic Churches Of Boston
